description: Evaluate how well the summary captures the key points of the article on a scale from 1 to 5. Consider whether the summary includes all essential aspects while omitting unimportant details.

scoring.1: The summary fails to capture the key points of the article. It omits most essential aspects and includes numerous irrelevant details.
scoring.2: The summary captures a few key points but misses several essential aspects, including some irrelevant details that detract from the main message.
scoring.3: The summary captures many of the key points but may overlook some important aspects. It includes a few irrelevant details that do not significantly detract from the overall understanding.
scoring.4: The summary effectively captures most of the key points and includes all essential aspects while minimizing irrelevant details. It offers a clear understanding of the article's main message with minor omissions.
scoring.5: The summary excellently captures all key points and essential aspects of the article, omitting unimportant details entirely. It provides a comprehensive and concise understanding of the article's main message.

description: Assess how effectively a summary encapsulates the key points from an article, focusing on its ability to include essential information while excluding unnecessary details.

scoring.1: The summary fails to capture the main points of the article, missing critical information and including numerous irrelevant details.
scoring.2: The summary captures some key points but omits important aspects or includes a significant amount of unimportant information.
scoring.3: The summary adequately conveys most of the key points from the article, with minor omissions or inclusion of unimportant details.
scoring.4: The summary effectively captures almost all key points, with only minor omissions or minimal inclusion of unnecessary information.
scoring.5: The summary captures all essential points of the article, providing a clear and concise representation of the original content.

description: Evaluate how well the summary captures the key points of the article, ensuring it includes all essential aspects while omitting unimportant details.

scoring.1: The summary fails to capture the key points of the article, missing essential information and including irrelevant or misleading details.
scoring.2: The summary captures some key points but omits significant information or includes unnecessary details, leading to a partial understanding of the article's content.
scoring.3: The summary captures most key points and provides a general understanding of the article, though some important aspects may be missing or overshadowed by minor details.
scoring.4: The summary effectively captures the key points of the article with only minor omissions or inclusion of extraneous details, providing a clear and concise understanding.
scoring.5: The summary perfectly encapsulates all key points of the article, omitting irrelevant details and providing a thorough and clear understanding of the content.
